menuItemSelectionLogger.description: Title of context menu item that logs the selected text when clicked.

menuItemMD5.description: Get MD5 hash of selected content

menuItemSHA1.description: Get SHA-1 hash (not cryptographically secure) of selected content

menuItemSHA256.description: Get SHA-256 hash of selected content

menuItemSHA512.description: Get SHA-512 hash of selected content

menuItemOpenSidebar.description: Title of context menu item that opens a sidebar.
